settings.faq_heading: What does my Derma Relief Cream contain?
settings.faq_text: The SkinBiome Co.’s Derma Relief Cream is carefully formulated in the science lab of Dr Davide Pennino. Each jar of Derma Relief Cream contains just 14 ingredients: Aqua, Disodium Ethylenediaminetetraacetic acid (EDTA), Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Glycerin, Dermafixium, Niacinamide phenoxyethanol, Shea butter, Sodium acrylate, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Ethyl Olivate/Olea Europaea (Olive) Leaf Extract, Hydrolyzed Jojoba Esters, Phytosteryl/Octyldodecyl Lauroyl Glutamate, Ethylhexylglycerin and Penoxyethanol. Also, the Derma Relief Cream is GMO-free!
